1.「<%sL_MINION> ついてクンを| 選ぶんだね？|<yesno><clo: <%sL_MINION> So, you're going to pick Tsuki|Kun?<yesno><close>

3.「やあ いらっしゃい。| ここは 玩具屋だよ。| 今日は どんな用かな？: Hey, there... This is Toy... What can I do|for you today?

4.「ここは 玩具屋なんだけど……| 店は まだ 準備中なんだ。| ごめんな。|<b:
This is a toy store, but... We're still|setting up. Uh... If you happen to have a|Follow Me capsule somewhere, would you mind|
|bringing it to me? I'd love to!

6.「新しい 旅の相棒の 誕生だ！| 大切にしてね！|<br>|「というわけで| 他: You have a new traveling companion! Take good|care of him! So, if there's anything else you|need, I'm at your service.<break>

7.「それで？| 今日は どんな用で 来たのかな？|<break>: So? What brings you here today?<break>

8.「やあ いらっしゃい。| ここは 玩具屋だよ。|<br>|「キミは 『ついてクン:
Hey, there... This is Toy... Have you ever|heard of Tsurette-kun? It's a magical pet|that my grandfather created through|
|alchemy... He's a very cute little guy who|moves around a lot and always follows his|owner around. The newly created Followers|
|come in capsules that can be broken in front|of their owners to become their pets. If the|owner brings the capsule to me, I can break|
|it open and take the lucky one inside with|me. My grandfather is the only alchemist who|can make Followers, so I haven't been able to|
|find anyone who has a capsule.

9.「ええ！ カプセルのままにしとくのかい？| そうか……。持ち主はキミだし 仕方な: Oh, my God! You're gonna leave me in stasis?|Well... I mean, you're the owner, so... I'll|call you when I'm ready to take it out...

10.<pipipi_off>|<%sL_KAPSEL>が 割られ|中から ついてクン: <pipipi_off><%sL_KAPSEL> is cracked open, and out of it|pops SOMEONE to walk with him!<end>

11.「よっしゃー！ まかせて！| さっそく割っちゃうよ！|<br>|<shake_b: All right! I got it! I'm gonna crack it open!<shake_big>Hoorah! ACHOOOOOOO!<end>

12.「おや？| キミが持ってる それは| <%sL_MINION>の カプセルじゃな:
Hmm? Isn't that a <%sL_MINION> capsule you're|holding? It's pretty rare, but it's useless|as is. You'd like to make a pet out of it,|
|wouldn't you? If you'd like, I could break it|open and let your little friend out. What are|you gonna do? You're gonna break the capsule?

13.「ん？| キミは ついてクンを 持っていないようだ。| 連れ歩くことは できない: Hmm? You don't have a tether. You can't just|walk around...

14.「どこかで ついてクンの カプセルを| 見つけたら ボクのところに| 持ってきて:
If you find a Follow Me capsule somewhere,|can you bring it to me? I'll break the|capsule, and I'll make Follow Me your|
|sidekick.

15.「今 連れている ついてクンを| 休ませてあげるのかい？|<yesno><clo: Are you going to let your boyfriend rest now?<yesno><close>

18.「連れ歩きたい ついてクンは | さくせんコマンドの いろいろ設定以下にある|:
If you want to take him with you, you can|change the "Follow Me" setting in the "Follow|Me" section of the SES command... Bring me a|
|new capsule, and I'll break it for you.|Goodbye. Have a great trip, buddy!

19.「他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。|<break>: If there's anything else you need, I'm at|your disposal...<break>

20.「やめるのかい？| 他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。|<break>: Are you quitting? If there's anything else|you need, I'm at your disposal...<break>

21.「ついてクンは ヤクウっていう| 知り合いの じいさんが 錬金術で作った| ふし:
My friend Yakuzu... is a mysterious pet-like|creature... that my grandfather created|through alchemy. On your journey, if you find|
|a capsule that contains Follow Me, please|bring it to me... I've made it so that you|can carry it around with you... as a cute|
|little sidekick that will follow you around.|Each species has its own personality. If you|observe them, you may discover many things...|
|I can't participate in the battle against the|demons, but once I have it, I'll treasure it|and take care of it forever...

22.「というわけで| 他にも用があれば なんなりと どうぞ。|<break>: So, if there's anything else you need, I'm at|your disposal.<break>

23.「それだと 今 連れているのと 同じだよ。| 別の ついてクンを 選ばなきゃ。: That's the same one you've got. I'm going to|choose another one.
